en.who_am_i_description:
I am an experienced math and physics teacher in high school and college, specializing (and passionate!) about helping middle and high school students, especially those who are far from France. I love to pass on my knowledge. I have followed young people in the CNED international program for two years. I am convinced that any student can succeed as long as he/she is listened to, helped and supported. And this is true in all subjects! An individualized follow-up, a positive approach, and it works! 
 Contact me to discuss it!
en.class_1_description: Personalized follow-up of young people enrolled in the CNED's international complement in the three subjects, in order to transform the CNED's courses into real live and interactive courses!
en.class_2_description: My favorite subject! Or how to make people love math and raise their grades dramatically!
en.class_3_title: One-off course on a particular point
en.class_3_description: A blockage? A specific need in a subject? We discuss it and establish a plan to get back on track!
en.class_4_title: Preparation of exams, brevet, bac in the form of training courses
en.class_4_description: Objective exams: courses adapted to each one, in remote or face-to-face, to gain confidence and pass the final exam!
en.testimony_1_description:
I really enjoyed the math classes with Emmanuelle! 
 She is always patient and explains very well. She always says that I am doing well. She was very flexible about changing times because of my homework. 
 She really cares about me and not just my math level.
en.testimony_2_description:
Thank you Emmanuelle for your dedication in accompanying our daughter throughout the year. You have given her confidence in herself: she was afraid of mathematics and it has become her favorite subject! 
 A real teacher makes all the difference: in each chapter, all the notions are well studied with typical exercises. Your encouragement and your way of making the lessons fun and positive have made these weekly meetings a time that our daughter really appreciates and looks forward to.
en.testimony_3_description: What I liked about Madame d'HÃ©brail is her patience, Madame d'HÃ©brail is extremely patient even if we spend 45 minutes on the same exercise she always keeps her smile and keeps her cool, which I think is not easy ğŸ˜‚. What I also like about Madame d'HÃ©brail is that she knows how to explain and elaborate the exercises extremely well, whether it's for Math, Physics Chemistry or French. Thanks to Madame d'HÃ©brail I managed to pass my DNB with only one year of French schooling. Extraordinary teacher!
en.testimony_4_description:
Good evening Emmanuelle, I wanted to thank you sincerely. My baccalaureate results came in and I got an 18 in math. I am very grateful for all the time you gave me. I think you gave me the keys to have confidence in myself, which was important. 
 Thank you for everything!!
en.testimony_5_description:
Mrs. d'HÃ©brail has been helping me to maintain my level in math since my 9th grade. She is very patient with me and encourages me a lot! She knows how to explain maths in an explicit and rather interesting way even if it's still work :) . I always manage to understand the exercise or the lesson. It can take more or less time but she never gives up ! 
 A big thank you!!!
en.testimony_6_description:
I've known you since 12th grade and thanks to you, I learned to love math... and it wasn't easyğŸ˜‰. 
 You gave me the desire to understand, advised me and explained in a simple and fun way! I remember the pasta and colors for the litteral calculation ğŸ˜Š 
 Even at a distance of several hours by plane, and thanks to Zoom, you supported me with kindness and benevolence! 
 I passed my brevet, with a good grade in maths and am going to 10th grade, reassured, because I know I have a great teacher I can count on! 
 Thanks for everything and I look forward to working with you againğŸ˜
en.contact_description: Specifying if necessary the situation and the time in which you wish to be contacted.
en.cost_description: Let's talk about it! I am more motivated by your child's success than by what you can fix!
